body: Her being forced to let go of the red string by drugs wasn't ok with me. If it wasn't by that It'd have been quite realistic. Not that I'm complaining tho. Not that I care for either of these characters

While it is great that one can be with their 'destined partner', sometimes life ain't gonna be like that. When the 'destined' part are just a thread and some vague feelings that are left to fade over the years, it is highly possible that the 'destined' route gonna be crushed and destroyed. Nothing gonna last forever, even those strong feelings for someone. This particular doujin is not suitable for some vanilla consumers but it could be what would actually happens without plot armor. This doujin is just some made up dramatic events that followed if Taki and Mitsuha never encountered again which is realistically more convincing. Thus, what I think after skimming through the doujin is: "It needn't to be the destined person that one always waiting for, if they have a person that treasures them, that's destiny."

This is CANON because Makoto Shinkai originally planned to end the film with a sad ending; The two protagonists, Mitsuha Miyamizu and Taki Tachibana can't find or realize each other. In the end, Mitsuha was already married to another man while Taki started a new relationship to his former college girl friend that resembles to Miki Okudera. Both of them giving up on finding each other, they learn to move on and go their separate ways in the end.

It's been years since the comet fell, and now Mitsuha who became a beautiful and attractive woman in college,
One day, she catches the eye of a brutish upperclassman in the same club and she refuse to him who wants a relationship several times. She's is too timid to tell him off. Senior Hamaguchi, who is popular handsome chad student in college university and Mitsuha was far from being weak, but Hamaguchi's next target is Mitsuha.
When they went out for a date, he put 
sleeping pills in wine and Mitsuha was taken to the hotel.Hamaguchi takes her to a love hotel as he was making love to her. Even after Mitsuha wakes up, Hamaguchi continues to rape and make sweet love to her until she fall in love with him and get pregnant ...And before Mitsuha can see "Taki Tachibana" again, she's lost her virginity.
